channel.title: Finally Confirmed!
channel.description:
Yes finally gamespot has confirmed that MW3 will be coming out on the 3DS! I cant wait! Already pre ordered :).
COD Games Owned
DS: COD 4 MW COD MW2 COD WAW COD BO COD MW3D((Modern Warfare 3 3D)(pre ordered))
PS3: COD 4 MW COD MW2 COD BO (All Map Packs) COD MW3(Pre ordered)
Video Link for 3DS: http://www.gamespot.com/3ds/driving/need-for-speed-the-run/video/6315276/call-of-duty-modern-warfare-3-gameplay-trailer

item.title: Finally Confirmed!
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

yeah battlefield is amazing. i was very sad to learn that its not coming to the 3ds. oh well good thing i got a ps3 lol

item.title: Finally Confirmed!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Call of Duty has been my favorite game until I tried Battlefield, I’ve been addicted to it ever since for it’s awesome graphics and

realistic effects. Though I still love Call of Duty and I can’t wait for this, already pre-ordered.

Read full topic

item.title: Finally Confirmed!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

I’ll go and follow the topic subject and add my own bit of old news.

Hideo Kojima and Konami announced that Metal Gear Solid 2, 3 and Peace Walker will get a re-vamp and go HD in a collection. It will come out for Ps3 and Xbox but Metal Gear Solid 4 will stay a ps3 exclusive.

Tbh, better news for me than CoD. Btw, Sittion is an idiot.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

I know I read about that too. I’m happy that for once they are making the DS version exactly like the others(ps3, xbox , pc, ect…). Finally with the 3DS they can actually put nice graphics and follow the actual story

MW3 Gameplay footage: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jNjCv9OIF-M

item.description:

Out of all of them MW2 is still my favorite. (PS3 or DS version) I just hope they dont run MW3 like black ops. The only good thing about that game was the zombies. Lovin the new map pack by the way
